DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , open-label study compare efficacy safety MabThera/Rituxan ( rituximab ) alone , combination Roferon-A ( interferon alfa-2a ) patient follicular CD20+ low-grade lymphoma . Patients randomize receive either MabThera/Rituxan 375 mg/m2 intravenously weekly 4 week Roferon-A 3 MIU/day subcutaneously Week 1 follow 4.5 MIU/day sc Weeks 2-5 plus MabThera/Rituxan 375 mg/m2 weekly iv Weeks 3-6 . Patients response receive additional cycle treatment . The anticipated time study treatment 6 month .
